arStrings.szText: {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} now Shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. As a Dire Werewolf you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed instead of Damage Reduction and a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*2|%|]{/c} Spirit cost reduction bonus. In addition, kills Heal you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.
